data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus nigra (Black pine) from sample SORBA-132

Exposition NE, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Granit Grobblock, Tree line 2000 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 1%, Herb cover 30%, Vegatation type: Galio rotundif. -Pin. nigr. ssp. laricionis, Film number: 629A
